DOC.criteria: Medically stable , judged basis history concurrent disease Subject understand procedure protocol willing comply protocol . Scheduled receive another vaccine study . Received influenza HA vaccine within 180 day prior screen . Received scheduled receive live vaccine within 28 day prior vaccination study vaccine , receive schedule receive inactivate vaccine toxoid within 7 day prior vaccination study vaccine . Diagnosis immune deficit past family member ( within third degree kinship ) diagnosis congenital immunodeficiency syndrome . Received one follow medication treatment prior vaccination study vaccine : 1 . Within 28 day prior vaccination study vaccine 1 . Interferon formulation 2 . Drugs affect immune system ( e.g. , immunosuppressant ) 3 . Systemic corticosteroid inhale corticosteroid 4 . GCSF MCSF 2 . Within 84 day prior vaccination study vaccine 1 . Human immunoglobulin product 2 . Blood product 3 . Blood transfusion 3 . Within 180 day prior vaccination study vaccine 1 . Highdose human immunoglobulin product ( ≥200 mg/kg ) History anaphylactic shock allergic reaction generalize eruption due food drug ( include vaccine ) allergy , fever ≥39.0°C within 2 day previous vaccination ( influenza vaccine others ) History seizure ( exclude pyrexial attack childhood ) History GuillainBarre syndrome acute disseminate encephalomyelitis ( ADEM ) Body temperature ≥37.5°C Day 1 ( vaccination ) Moderate severe acute febrile illness ( ≥37.5°C ) within 7 day prior vaccination Concurrent hepatic disease ( exclude fatty liver , hepatic cyst , biliary stone gallbladder poly , laboratory finding , clinical symptom , necessary treat ) , AST ( GOT ) and/or ALT ( GPT ) > 100 IU/L screen Day 1 Concurrent renal disease ( exclude rental cyst calculus kidney laboratory finding , clinical symptom , necessary treat ) , creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL screen Concurrent respiratory disease , hematologic disease , developmental disorder Concurrent previous heart disease Concurrent previous cerebrovascular disorder Concurrent malignancy diagnosis treatment malignancy within 5 year screen Diagnosis mental disorder include schizophrenia , bipolar disorder , major depressive disorder cognitive impairment , receive medication cognitive impairment Concurrent disease interfere evaluation local systemic reaction
